content: Investments Asked by Jodie DangAsked on 18 Sep 2019If I want to sell the Nikko AM ETF STI, when will the selling be performed?How about if I want to sell via POSB Bank, does it have to wait till the deduction day to sell or on the day itself if not the next working day?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Han Jinyuan Larry, Senior Lifeguard at CertisLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 18 Sep 2019If today you sell, your account will be credited within T+7 business days from the date you submit your redemption request. https://www.posb.com.sg/personal/investments/investing-in-funds/invest-saver?cid=sg:en:cbg:bsd:sem:goo:na:na:fpg:cen_fpg_sem_2018:na:%2Betf&gclsrc=aw.ds&&gclid=EAIaIQobChMIgqv92_PZ5AIVl4RwCh1ohwGQEAAYASAAEgJxNPD_BwE0 comments1
